[h1]Review zu "Team Fortress 2"[/h1]

Am Anfang dachte ich, es ist so ein sinnloser, auf Comic - basierender, [b]FPS[/b].

Doch als ich es dann "Angezockt" habe, kam ich gefühlte 10 Stunden nicht weg! :)
Die Klassen sind gut ausbalanciert und die Waffen machen einen riesen Spass! 

[u]Fazit:[/u] Ob Kostenlos oder nicht, auf jedenfall ein Spiel das in der Steam Bibliothek nicht fehlen darf!!
ami no me gusta pero a los demas si asi q depende de tus gustos si te gusta o no
Team fortress, the game which I've had so much fun with. I heavily recommend this masterpiece of entertainment material. Very addictive and joyful

So my previous review stated this game wasn't working. Well that's sorted and I can say with confidence that this is a great game. Its similar to your average fps gameplay wise, but it has so many other mechanics to it. Different classes are nowhere near the same. Maps are creative and well made and the gamemodes are fun. You can't complain for free.

This one of the best games I have ever played. But even though it is a good game, every game has its pros and cons.
CONS
*Meet Your Match at launch
*Unbalanced weapons (Phlogistinator)
*In-Game competitive mode
*Not that well optimized.
*WHY DOES IT ALWAYS PUT ME ON FUCKING 2FORT?
PROS
*Everything except the above
Also JETPACK

Ecoutez, 9 classes avec un gameplay totalement différent les unes de l'autre, plusieurs dizaines d'armes différentes, ainsi que d'objets cosmétiques comme des chapeaux.
Une des meilleures communauté des jeux-vidéos.
Un suivi régulier par ValVe, et de nouvelles update très fréquentes.
Un système d'échange pour ceux appréciant le commerce 
Et le tout GRATUIT
Que dire de plus

This is the shit yer momma told ya about. Nothing like doing 3 bumps of baked beans right to the brain waves and jerkin off to the very realistic graphics that this game offers.

So i recently switched from console to pc and i bought overwatch thinking i would play it more. I now have 163 hours in tf2 and 15 in overwatch. I dont know why but this games is just so more fun and intrestring (i cant spell xD). The trading community is brilliant even though this game is almost 10 years old and the actual community are awesome! This game was made buy the community! Anyway in conclusion tf2 is a really fun fsast paced shooter with different classes and TONS of customisation options. Further more there are 100s of different play styles and its also free!!
pretty fun shooter game and can run with pre low specs 8/10

Oyun gayet güzel ve eğlenceli, birçok karakterin olması eğlenceyi daha da artırıyor. Beğenmeyenler genellikle oyunun grafiklerini beğenmiyorlar ve oyunu kötülüyorlar fakat grafiklerinin bu şekilde olması oyunun tarzından dolayı yani cs go grafikleriyle bu oyun oynansa çok ta güzel olacağını sanmıyorum. Sonuç olarak kimseye kulak asmayın ve oynayın, zevk alacaksınız.

Edit: Oyuna uzun bir aradan sonra yeniden girdim, 3 4 gündür oynuyor(d)um. Ara sıra bot geliyor sunucudan atıyorduk. Ancak bugün arka arkasıya 4 kere 7 şer 8 er bot olan oyunlara düştüm. Botlar sizi banlıyorlar ve oynamanıza izin vermiyorlar. Siz banlamaya kalksanız zaten sayınız yetmiyor. Şu oyunda bile bot kullanan çapsız insanlar yüzünden oyunu silmeye yakınım

If you came here looking for a review, you have come to the wrong place, but if you want some very ♥♥♥♥ing good brownies, you have come to the right place. You're welcome for an actual recipe, not a ♥♥♥♥♥♥ copy and paste pie recipe. Trust me nothing goes wrong with nutella.

INGREDIENTS:

1 c. unsalted butter
2 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. flour
1 c. cocoa powder
4 eggs
1 (13-oz.) jar Nutella
5 Ferrero Rocher candies, unwrapped and crumbled


DIRECTIONS:

1. Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
2. Melt butter in a medium-sized saucepan over medium heat. Add sugar, stirring until combined. 3. Remove from heat and add salt, flour, and cocoa powder, stirring to combine. Whisk in eggs, stirring just until the mixture is combined into a batter. Set aside.
4. Spray an 8"-x-8" pan with cooking spray. Pour half of the batter into the pan. Spoon or lightly drizzle most of the Nutella on top of the batter, forming an even layer over the brownie batter. 5. 5. Use a spoon or silicone spatula to cover the Nutella with the remaining brownie batter. (If you pour the batter straight on top of the Nutella, it will sink into the Nutella and combine into one marbled—yet delicious—mess.)
6. Bake until the top layer of brownies has browned and set, 28 to 30 minutes. It shouldn’t jiggle when you remove it from the oven. (The toothpick test doesn’t work here, since the toothpick will hit the Nutella layer, making the brownies seem uncooked.)
7. Let cool for 15 to 20 minutes, then top with a drizzle of Nutella and crumbled Ferrero Rocher chocolates. Cut into squares and serve.



Credits: ★ Billy
